data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Yu-Xia, Yang, Xing-Ke (2009): A new species of Micropodabrus Pic from Hainan, China, and a new name to replace M. coomani (Pic) (Coleoptera, Cantharidae). Zootaxa 2014: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185880
